account_id.description: Microsoft account ID for the calendar.

event_id.description: Identifier of the event to forward.

oneOf.description: Primary recipients for the forwarded invitation.

to.description: Recipient email or list; combined with CC must not exceed 500 unique addresses.

cc.description: Optional CC email or list; combined recipients limited to 500 unique addresses.

message.description: Optional plain text comment to include with the forward.

confirm.description: Must be true to allow forwarding (safety confirmation).
